EmailTemplate.description: Sent after discussion, prompt user to create SALT account
EmailTemplate.name: Discussion Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, Thanks for talking to me about SALT!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings {!Contact.FirstName},
As a follow up to our discussion yesterday, you can create a SALT account and access the full on-line experience by visiting https://www.saltmoney.org and using ASA University as your school affiliation. This will give you the opportunity to navigate the site and take an in-depth look at our content and curriculum.
In addition, I wanted to share links for our SALT blog, Twitter and Facebook page. The blog is a great resource and it displays our approach to deliver useful information in a relate able tone. We have a diverse group of knowledgeable contributors including students and recent graduates.
SALT Blog: http://blog.saltmoney.org/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/SALT_MONEY Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/saltmoney
Also, we've recently created a video that introduces the SALT program and more specifically provides a guided tour of the platform. {!Contact.FirstName}, this could be useful as you look to introduce our efforts to folks on your team and then, we may consider including this in a member communication about our partnership. The link is below.
https://www.youtube.com/user/getSALTmoney
If you have any questions as you peruse the site, please pass them my way.
Best regards, {!User.FirstName} {!User.Email}
